Title: Relates to applying a special Medicaid rate for releasees in nursing homes
Summary: Relates to applying a special Medicaid rate for releasees in facilities or discrete units within facilities that provide long term nursing or medical services.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to applying a special Medicaid rate for releasees in nursing homes
